name: Serino - Royale Medio - Toro
additionalNotes:
Serino Cigars debuted their Royale line in 2016 with the intention of appealing to cigar smokers at every level.  The Medio was intended to perform in the medium-bodied category and his since taken the world by storm.  If you enjoy prominent notes of cedar and brownie mix, it's time that you meet 
The Serino Royale Medio is medium-bodied yet rich in flavor. This blend was crafted to give the vintage taste of a Cuban profile with the cacao notes of Nicaraguan tobacco. The cigar features a Ecuador Habano Medio wrapper over Nicaragua Jalapa Criollo '98 binder with fillers consisting of Jalapa Criollo '98, Medio Tiempo, Corojo '99 and Estelí Criollo '98. The result is a cigar with notes of toasted peanut, milk chocolate, cinnamon and raisin.
